channel.title: Custom Weapon with Animation
channel.description: Ok I made a custom weapon and I want to add the slashing animation to it when I fight but I can't find anywhere where it tells you how. I posted this on the Models Section and they told me it was a server sided problem so I came here.

item.title: Custom Weapon with Animation
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

TrinityN:

Ok it’s all working besides the GetWepAnim. I have it right but it just looks like normal non animation slash.

I have no idea what the problem is then.
Sorry I couldn’t help.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Weapon with Animation
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Your going to need to find this public int GetWepAnim() {, public int GetRunAnim, public int GetWalkAnim(int id) {(int id) {, and public int GetStandAnim(int id) { in client.java and add for the GetWepAnim if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == *item id*) { return *emote id*;

and for the rest of them add

if (id == *item id*) { return *emote id*;

Read full topic
